name: Minus Plus
description:
You and your partner needs to "connect" by running in to each other, and activating the electricity.

Originally made for the Extra Credits Game Jam 4#

You control the characters by using WASD for the red character (plus), and the ARROW KEYS for the blue character (minus).

And the more you move the more cables you spawn, but there is a max to how many cables each player can lay, and when this happens the level restarts.

There is only one level at this point, and a few glitches, as me and my friend wasn't able to work more on this project, sadly :( But we might expand the game in the future.

Thank you for playing!
